rooms.name: Entrance Hall
rooms.description: Traditional Kerala-style entrance with stone flooring and wooden beam ceilings.

rooms.name: Living Room
rooms.description: Open space with Kerala decorative elements and wood carvings.

rooms.name: Dining Area
rooms.description: Adjacent to the living room for communal dining.

rooms.name: Kitchen
rooms.description: Integrated with a pantry and traditional Kerala kitchen layout.

rooms.name: Master Bedroom
rooms.description: Spacious bedroom featuring Vastu compliant north-east facing window.

rooms.name: Guest Bedroom 1
rooms.description: Cozy guest room with access to the patio area.

rooms.name: Guest Bedroom 2
rooms.description: Additional guest bedroom ensuring privacy and comfort.

rooms.name: Study/Library
rooms.description: Designated study/library area enriched with traditional Kerala woodwork and book shelves.

openings.description: Large windows for natural light and ventilation.
Door leading to the outdoor terrace.
